summary.para: Defines statistics collected by the network source. The values in this enumeration define property identifiers (PIDs) for the MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS property.

To retrieve statistics from the network source, call with the service identifier MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_SERVICE and the interface identifier IID_IPropertyStore. The retrieved pointer is an IPropertyStore pointer. To get the value of a network statistic, construct a PROPERTYKEY with fmtid equal to MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS and pid equal to a value from this enumeration. Then call IPropertyStore.GetValue with the property key to retrieve the value of the statistic as a .
In the descriptions that follow, the data type and value-type tag for the are listed in parentheses.

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_RECVPACKETS_ID
member.summary: The number of packets received (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_LOSTPACKETS_ID
member.summary: The number of packets lost (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_RESENDSREQUESTED_ID
member.summary: The number of requests to resend packets (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_RESENDSRECEIVED_ID
member.summary: The number of resent packets received (LONG) (VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_RECOVEREDBYECCPACKETS_ID
member.summary: The total number of packets recovered by error correction (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_RECOVEREDBYRTXPACKETS_ID
member.summary: The total number of packets recovered by retransmission (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_OUTPACKETS_ID
member.summary: The total number of packets returned to user, including recovered packets (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_RECVRATE_ID
member.summary: The 10-second average receiving rate (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_AVGBANDWIDTHBPS_ID
member.summary: The average bandwidth of the clip (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_BYTESRECEIVED_ID
member.summary: The total number of bytes received (ULONGLONG, VT_UI8).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_PROTOCOL_ID
member.summary: The type of control protocol used to receive the data (LONG, VT_I4). The value is a member of the enumeration.

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_TRANSPORT_ID
member.summary: The type of control protocol used to receive the data (LONG, VT_I4). The value is a member of the enumeration.

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_CACHE_STATE_ID
member.summary: The status of cache for a media file or entry (LONG, VT_I4). The value is a member of the enumeration.

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_LINKBANDWIDTH_ID
member.summary: The current link bandwidth, in bits per second (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_CONTENTBITRATE_ID
member.summary: The current bit rate of the content (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_SPEEDFACTOR_ID
member.summary: The negotiated speed factor used in data transmission (LONG, VT_I4). The sender transmits data at the rate of the speed factor multiplied by the bit rate of the content.

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_BUFFERSIZE_ID
member.summary: The playout buffer size, in milliseconds (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_BUFFERPROGRESS_ID
member.summary: The percentage of the playout buffer filled during buffering. The value is an integer in the range 0–100. (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_LASTBWSWITCHTS_ID
member.summary: The number of ticks since the last bandwidth switch (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_SEEKRANGESTART_ID
member.summary: The start of the seekable range, in 100-nanosecond units (ULONGLONG, VT_UI8).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_SEEKRANGEEND_ID
member.summary: The end of the seekable range, in 100-nanosecond units (ULONGLONG, VT_UI8).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_BUFFERINGCOUNT_ID
member.summary: The number of times buffering has occurred, including the initial buffering (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_INCORRECTLYSIGNEDPACKETS_ID
member.summary: The number of packets that had incorrect signatures (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_SIGNEDSESSION_ID
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether the current session is signed (VARIANT_BOOL, VT_BOOL).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_MAXBITRATE_ID
member.summary: The current maximum bit rate of the content (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_RECEPTION_QUALITY_ID
member.summary: The reception quality (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_RECOVEREDPACKETS_ID
member.summary: The total number of recovered packets (LONG, VT_I4).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_VBR_ID
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether the content has a variable bit rate (VARIANT_BOOL, VT_BOOL).

member.name: MFNETSOURCE_STATISTICS_IDS.MFNETSOURCE_DOWNLOADPROGRESS_ID
member.summary: The percentage of the content that has been downloaded. The value is an integer in the range 0–100. (LONG, VT_I4).
